widget.title: Button
widget.p: The following button displays a short text string and an image. Its content is on the left and centered vertically.

parameters.parameter: The text string that the button displays.
The icon image that the button displays. Icons are always displayed to the left of text (if any).
The alignment of the text and image similar to label. Possible values are: center, left, and right. The default value is center.
Specifies the index of underlined char, and the key combination (alt+mnemonic) which invokes the (not necessarily focused, but enabled and visible) button's action listener.
Invokes the given method when the button is pressed by mouse or keyboard.

Possible values are: normal, default, cancel, and link. The default value is normal. Default, and cancel values are for dialog control. Link changes the appearance of button so that it resembles HTML link.
name, enabled, visible, tooltip, property, i18n, width, height, colspan, rowspan, weightx, weighty, halign, and valign parameters are similar to component
